availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John S. Scott (Kenton County, KY, deputy sheriff)

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky, deputy sheriff. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Carpenter Scott. Father of Richard "Dickie" Scott. Resident of Kenton County in 1850. Deputy sheriff of Kenton County in 1860, 1863, and 1864.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, Ward 3, p. 637.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994027-994058, Kenton County Births, 1857, p. 8, (Accessed via ancestry.com on March 11, 2020).
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Kentucky, 6th Congressional District, Vol. 3, June and July 1863, p. 423, (Accessed via ancestry.com on March 11, 2020).
Birth and Death Records: Covington, Lexington, Louisville, and Newport – Microfilm (before 1911), KDLA, Roll #7011811, Kenton County Deaths, p. 526.
Find A Grave, "John S. Scott (1824-1884)," Memorial #86756671, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/86756671 (accessed February 11, 2020).
KYR-0001-004-1321.
